Roll a d20 and on [Number of Enchantments] * 2 or lower, the item becomes inert and unenchantable.

Gisengard's have enchanted scales that grant make them very difficult to kill and very desirable.

Every so often, the properties of a Gisengard change, shifting through flame, ice, or divine energy. The glow of their scales can give away what the alignment the creature is, however the glow is not always obvious.

Despite the scale's properties, once killed, only a few scales retain their properties if any.

import.backstory:
An avid politician and musician, made a name for himself fighting for the people and the church even though he himself was not a member. Advocating for freedom of expression where some were frowned upon for wayward practices.

Also plays in a local orchestra.
import.description:
A tall, slender figure, typically dressed in dark, if not black, clothes.

Very charming and easy to believe for any who do not immediately distrust him.
import.name: Ixeba Ratabu
import.note:
He is from the Fey wild and a follower of Cthulu. He uses his power to help mask the activities of the Church and pretends to follow no god.

Uses the orchestra as a cover for casting musical magics. Aided by spells in the concert halls placed by the servants of the church, noticing the spells and resisting them is very difficult.

import.backstory:
A slightly well-to-do woman from Picio, she met and married Ixeba several years ago and recently moved to be with him in Peum.

Somewhat disturbed by the air of the city, ocean coastal life seems different than lake coastal life to her and she is trying to get settled.
import.name: Corsiva Ratabu
import.note: Ixeba married her merely for fun and the illusion of participating in society. She herself is quite innocent but strangely protected by him for how little he tells himself that he cares for her.

import.backstory:
Rele grew up in Leu, generally starving and fought for scraps.

Her rough upbringing left her weaker than a dragonborn would normally be thought to be, but helped her to learn much.
import.description:
Having suffered through poverty and struggling with living despite the conditions for Draconia as a whole, she fought and founded Neulus Re, though only recently.

Having earned the respect of the Queen for her work with helping to make sure that all people of the empire are taken care of, she was allowed to take a portion of the Draconian Army to the interior of Calokula to help feed the people.
import.name: Rele Mura
import.note:
Wants to do good but doesn't feel that laws always help with that and is willing to break laws to help another, but values her bonds with friends.

Her own set of laws allow her to follow Athena

import.backstory:
Born in libailumbo over 2 centuries ago, has grown to become master of the temple after traveling the world and becoming a great wizard herself in the path of her father.

Her father died helping Leoterra defend a city under siege by Nautregno while defending fleeing civilians that the Orcs were trying to capture for slaves.

Her mother still lives in Uliersa.
import.description:
A tall and slender elf, her mastery of the arcane doesn't show in her composure as she still has an air of aloofness and silliness to her as she moves.

Her students however quickly realize that her jovial attitude doesn't mean that she isn't strict.
import.name: Antjra Analaqa
import.note:
While aloof, this is more of a coping mechanism.

Has a distaste for Orcs & Half-Orcs but manages to be civil.

import.note: Profession: ShopKeep Has been toying with what he can find of ancient to create enchantments and alchemical items that allow him to do things far beyond him, though he doesn't quite understand them all and he's been driven mad with paranoia, but manages to run his shop. He keeps a portal to Reykurax active in his shop and going through that realm is how he moves his shop. He actually owns the other shops that he switches between but the people who run them are trusted by him and maintain the secret that they know him, though they don't know the extend of his experiments. His help in the creation of the city was more of a purest and doesn't like the rules and regulations, thus his pirating, but he sees their necessity and acts to keep the city as free as possible.

Mis treated by a few specific ${"content":"Draconian","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ nobles, ${"content":"Ilerar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ saved her when he plundered their ship. Then, she was merely someone whom he had saved from persecution but after leaving her in ${"content":"Curell","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, they came to have more of a relationship.

Pirating not a life for her, she lives in ${"content":"Curell","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and enjoys the rare visit from ${"content":"Ilerar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ when she can.

Has asthma, ${"content":"Ilerar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ is very respectful and understanding of it.

import.description:
A servant of ${"content":"Lucian","class":"rs-orange"}$ from a young age. He watched his parents and siblings get murdered and found comfort in the power of the arcane arts and killed those who had wronged him and his family.

Over time, he found that everyone was simply greedy and would do anything or let anything happen for themselves. Taking this up himself, he found himself agreeing with the teachings of his god even more and now serves to help enslave all for their own betterment.

Now serves as a member of ${"content":"Lucian's Spear","class":"rs-orange"}$.
import.name: Ivimico Voris

import.description:
The harsh continent of ${"content":"Lurus","class":"rs-orange"}$ hardens even the softest of creatures and Satheu killed many creatures surviving in the wilderness with his clan.

When confronted by a group of ${"content":"Cthulhian","class":"rs-orange"}$ priests, many of his clan were killed and in seeking revenge he found a hatred for the chaos of the world as many more of his clan died to greed of other leaders who sought nothing but gifts for themselves.

Turning to find powerful allies, he found servants of ${"content":"Lucian","class":"rs-orange"}$ and joined with them to bring order to small parts of the land.

Now serving as an elite group on the hunt for the ${"content":"Blade of the Mist","class":"rs-orange"}$, he and his fellow compatriots in ${"content":"Lucian's Spear","class":"rs-orange"}$
import.name: Satheu Sinbore

import.description:
Born on ${"content":"Turrija","class":"rs-orange"}$, she found herself killing others before she was 12.

Exiled from her peoples, she was deposited on the continent of 
${"content":"Colligus","class":"rs-orange"}$ and was soon being cared for in the walls of ${"content":"Curell","class":"rs-orange"}$.

Learning, she took her time, learning to stalk and kill others in the night for the entertainment she had come to enjoy while maintaining some piece of life in society. 

Being caught again by the city's guard as she tangled with an unwitting member of the ${"content":"Thieve's Guild","class":"rs-orange"}$, she found herself again chased out, and with her prior crimes unearthed, her family again rejected her to the darkness.

Roaming ${"content":"Colligus","class":"rs-orange"}$, she stowed away on a pirate ship, sailing to ${"content":"Galdur","class":"rs-orange"}$, where she jumped off and swam the some mile to shore.

Hunting down the creatures there proved more challenging and she came to enjoy the wilderness there until she found herself in the den of a pack of ${"content":"Moon Wolves","class":"rs-orange"}$ where she was saved by several servants of ${"content":"Lucian","class":"rs-orange"}$ who had been trying to drive the same pack of wolves back from their own temple and gave her shelter.

When her bloodlust got the best of her and she killed one of the servants in the night, the other servants applauded her skillfulness and offered her a place. She killed several others of the temple of the years in training and in the still of the night, but they accepted her and pointed her in a direction to bring their idea of right to the world.

Now she serves as a member of ${"content":"Lucian's Spear","class":"rs-orange"}$, leaving a trail of bodies everywhere she goes.

They may linger, but will eventually ignore things that are seemingly inanimate.

While they can be fooled by holding still in the face of their dangerous maw, they and not as easily fooled by small objects moving as one may hope.

Once they've found prey however, they are relentless in their pursuit.

However, finding himself lacking at a key moment while trying to appease an overly pushy and powerful guild master, he found himself cursed, his fortune telling magics twisting. His future was fraught with misfortune and he eventually died, slipping on a banana peel and stumbling off of an air ship. His favorite fortune telling cards slipping into the wind.

import.backstory: I'm a dwarf from an emerald mine. I've always been a little strange and enjoyed reading much more than my fellow dwarves. One day I came across an old book that contained three basic magic spells, and I secretly learned and practiced them. I found my true calling and decided to join the army, the only opportunity to get out of the mines and travel. I hope to find more knowledge and magic along the way.
import.name: Eldith of Ungart
import.note:
Leather armor, dagger (1d6 damage)

Scroll for Poe's ship: "take me home country road" for emergencies. Otherwise waive and ship will come

Draconia is home base (city of Dranous)

Brax-blacksmith

Dispatched again to go to Basil, get more crystals

Map of Basil to show dig site 

I have a cat as a familiar

3 healing potions, 2+2d4 each


Heading to Vatnunda with Ginnet, Ash, Quincy to get more crystals and mainly the artifact, around middle of east side of island.

Alex, please add: 1 pickax (sp?), 1 large unrefined crystal, scroll for Poe's ship, 1 smoke worth of Guines' special blend, 3 healing potions (2+2d4 each)

On Vetnunda, found ruins, rescued Aresa behind blue wall (with blue crystal) in Toumb of Aixer. She was kidnapped by Kintari. Next day followed tracks and found Aresa's friends. They don't think there would be an artifacts. There is a toumb, want to excavate and look at artifacts. From the arcane society (mages and wizards)

Borrowed orange crystal and map. Must mail to the arcane society. Bern Linga, wife is Lara Linga. Just mail from Draconia to arcane society. 

Part from arcane society ppl, Arisa says if ever in Tibet (Micalobelera) come say hi. 

Sketching runic symbol at top of wall by red giant crystal for later research.  

Color combinations to open doors: orange+green=yellow, blue+red=purple, yellow room has switches, turned all off, removed hilt, other walls collapsed, barely ran out. Tried to reset barriers next day, unsuccessful. Back on boat with Poe.

Read tome of the owl, +1  Intelligence 

Lar Untat- gave us last briefing (viceroy), giving him the artifact after last voyage.

Small base in Ascaqua, west side of continent in middle, to guard the artifact. We're insulated and help protect it. You can either carry it or hide it. Various interests in the artifact. 

Artifact: originally owned by the original king in the kingdom, 4 pieces dispersed after his death to keep piece. Help fight the wizard on Galdor with intact weapon. 

Umlima-perhaps pirate captain, personal vendetta (not sure vs who), attacking city of Ascaqua, need to kill pirates too if we see them. Likely a woman. Know to be in the ocean of Lampee. 

Our new team name is ICP (Insane Cardinal Party) :D 

Gizzingon (?) in fridge messed up the magic around the beer fridge that no longer works. 

Battle in woods with spiders and weird entity, pick up a septer, runes on it say Sorarusaru. Based on the word dream and back in old common draconic. 

Sleeping with scepter.  Advantage on saving throws against wisdom until next rest. 

Made it to Ascaqua, saw giant black panther on the way, but uneventful trip. 

Living in the royal quarters, very clean and pristine. Staying behind party to explore our new home, everyone else is going to the bars. Found a book about Language of ancient - i copied several runes when looking for the "weapon", so tells me they are made of different languages. Cravis is our point of contact.  

Nachaul is helping run our household: horses, cooking. 

Putting together plan to raid the pirates' house. Meeting at 8am. 

Fortified pirates hideout, tried looking, getting in, windows are magic, can't go down chimney etc. 

Pixie is a rat now,  going to do a stakeout. Goes horribly wrong, three pirates come talk to us and attack. Killed two, one being interrogated by Quincy and Lucy. Ash and Ginnet are on the way. Sending to Cravis to send backup.

Interrogating live pirate: came by teleportation circle. 

Stormed the pirate layer. 

Obtained unidentified scroll in pirate room. Ash took fireball scroll. Interrogated a pirate, stolen loot in cellar being cleared out. Get to cellar but already mostly clear. Another fire bolt scroll and unidentified scroll. 100 blank paper.  

Used one unidentified scroll to open secret passage to hallway, saw main pirate. Cast fog cloud and trying to move past three other pirates to go after main guy. 

Killed them all, ran past after main pirate. 

Wounded woman pirate, asked questions, left her tied up, didnt get much info. Made a fake poison potion for intimidation. 

Found alcove with pirates trying to flee in boats. Erupted earth, threw fireballs, killed several, red lady made spiders appear (from other dimension?), destroyed boats. 

Level 7

Back at house waking up. Lucy's new bracers are crushing her arm, 20 damage, Ash couldn't pull it off. 

Lazola's potions shop, Canta was the woman we impersonated. Plobin is the alchemsist and husband. 

Lucy can't get the bracers off, will deal 20 damage overnight every few nights, but will be useful in battle so we can heal her daily. 

Identifying scepter for 100 gold. Psychic weapon with scroll. 

Commotion at gates, we run to red gate (main gate), dark, torches in distance, everyone ready with cannons. Got to tower and see what is coming, messenger said something bad was coming. 

Killed the two giant worms, many snakes coming. Pixy is an owl. 

Fought snakes, if one snake is hit, other snake now immune to that hit. Kill some, others vanish into portal. One tower of main gate collapsed, town is destroyed/leveled, including castel. Our house has two broken windows, it was ransacked but otherwise ok. Found two kids and a magical cat hiding in Ash's bedroom. 

Tried sending to Nachaul, silence (probably dead). sending to Canta, she's at a refugee camp. Poe's ship approaches, we all got on, heading to Dranas. Kids have an aunt in Demar.

Uneventful trip to Dranas, but cat is magical. Pixie trying to talk to it. 

Pirates might be hiding in Colligus. Wildlands, settlers brave enough to stay, mostly wild beasts. City of Pium might have more info on pirates. Find a way onto a boat that might get pirated, have an item to scry hidden on the boat. 

Green inget Ginnet stole in the city with the broken beer cooler. Turns out it was a sole stone worth 100000s of gold. It can bring lives into existence even without bodies, can also take lives. Very difficult to make. Tavern keep had others.

learned tiny hut at library... went back to Poe's ship..... Ginnet got drunk and slept with a prostitute at the urging of Quincy and Lucy.  

Lemuli's Enchanted books (in Dranous): wizard ring for 4000 gold, too much so asked if we can do a service: Silendirida (island) cellar of a dragon, a rare book. Gold and silver. Retrieve book and get one free ring, and he'll make a second ring and sell at 4000. 

found fear, fly, gaseous form, haste, misty step, phantom steed. Copied misty step and fly. 

history on magical beasts: towns were being overrun in year 5ish by snakes and wolves etc. by year 40 it was dragons, and at 100 everything was somehow reset. At 60 towns were no longer overrun. Similar to what we've seen: kill one, next one resistant. No weather changes, but some ppl observed to just stand around and not be harmed, maybe controlling the beasts. Historian's knowledge: beasts somehow permeated by power crystal dust? not sure.

Creation of power crystals: recognize symbol, never mind, very involved process. Properties of pwr crystals: colors of crystals, 5 colors of crystals citizen - blue, crafter- green ,orange composer, red curator, lime is conformist. Can make lime crystal act like the other 4. Understand how to do it through enchanting. 
Snake books: formation of beasts related to density of crystal particles in areas, like different islands. smaller islands have some higher concentrations. Galdor comes up as center with high density. origin of crystals potentially. Selenderdia has lower concentration of crystals but higher concentrations of beasts. Vetnunda is standard in density. On big islands its more rare. Valdire (magical beast that are eternal and will become a solid idol , can atune to them but fatal if they dont like you) are the exception, but they don't want to give out information. Color chart: green: nature, defense. look in knowledge section. No mention of gold or silver crystals. 
Valdire (giant cat): defeat them in battle, a show of power gains their trust. Talking to them will bond with them.  They can be ridden. Does not mention what language to speak to them. 

Scepter is worth 1000 gold. Setting sail for the west, Colligus. 

Consumed an Alufa leaf for a good dream and got advantage on saving throws. 

Got to Colligus, went to mouth of river where Po left us. Walked up north shore, attacked by panthers and ranger on other side of river across a bridge. Panthers linked so HP collective. Ranger left, panthers killed. Found one clear crystal (power gone) inside one of the panthers. Will follow ranger's trail on south side of river. Mad at pixie for deserting us in battle, need to have a word. 

Tracking woman through woods, lost track by mountains toward lake. Tried sending, it was blocked, and was trying to locate us through the spell. Rolled high enough to cut off in time. Since we lost track of the tracks, assuming she's now tracking us. Ash left a note saying we're here after pirates so please don't kill us or join us. Could have attached a bomb, but we didn't cuz we mean no harm. Set up hut not too far from note, Pixie can see the note and us so she'll alert us if someone is reading it or is outside our hut. 

No one came, headed into mountain, overnight Pixie saw a light in the mountain. Found a cave where light probably came from. Found trap chamber. Went right, then forked again, end of one hallway is magical. Illusion, cant hear or speak in it. Then wood. (Illusion, Transmutation, Abjuration). Dispelled the illusion, the door took a green and blue crystal that disintegrated, and opened. found a book (ledger). Three magical door (Abjuration). Found a switch behind one painting, which opened right door. 

Dispelled magic on middle door. Found some boxes with potions, another hallway has illusion. It petrifies whoever goes in. Ash tries to dispell but fails. Dispelled again, and nothing there. Last door opened by same switch as the first door behind painting. Illusion with fire behind it (wood larry now disintegrated). Second hallway had spear at end, last hallway is very enchanted and has alchemist set at end. Mechanical spider went through but Lucy lost all intelligence when she tried going through. 

Decided to take long rest in the "office" area. I set alarm at entrance and retrieved Pixie, Ash sets alarm past first fork to second fork. 

Prepare feather fall (lvl 1)-replace comprehend languages; catapult vs burning hands (lvl 1)

Lucy: remembers alchemy and corrupting stone might help remove the bracers. Read somewhere that solution might be on Colligus (island we're on now).

Back to hallway to try and get to the alchemy set. 
Dispelled magic: worked. Shimmery purple, shimmery blue, shimmery green. Grabbed them all. Also found a hidden switch in the wall, pulled it, noise in hallway, something opened. 

Book and pipes taken.

Left cave, no more paths, stealthed out of mountain pass. went by lake, waled around, saw lights just before dawn of a caravan. As light came up, we caught up, told them we're explorers trying to map the place, haven't seen any ppl, you're the first so we wanted to come and see if we could be helped. Trading with a small settlement, headed there. Currell is a settlement, but won't tell us where. But we might find it on our own. Caravan has about 30 people. They trade with druids and other settlers. Don't like pirates. Our story is that we're from Asquaca that got levelled and we think it was a red pirate that we want to kill to avenge the city. Caravan of souls... travelled with them for 3 weeks. 

Isomere bogs: 6 dozen or so settlers, heavy mist to settlement, ghosts and skeletons. Don't burry dead here, burn them. At night ghosts and demons come out at night. Evien - matriarch of town, not really leader but looked up to. 

Spent the night in the town next to the mist. In a protected building. Saw a teenager come out of the mist. Possessed by a ghost, then briefly not, then again. Larry tried to grab him, but unsuccessful. Woman weeping for her child the next day. 

Piyaqua wizard went into the bog decades ago. 

Going into the mist. Cast detect magic, gradient, it's radiating from a center, heading toward center. 

Found a hut, witch came out attacking from inside. Refused to be friendly, but shes the sister of the missing witch. Eventually chased her into the hut down a hallway, into a room. Killed her, found corrupted stones. Crumbled some of it, energy coming from the corrupted crystals, damaging nearby walls. Ash casts dispell magic, works, and stones no longer volatile. 

Took broom, witch's hat, wand-need rune, two runes.

Her body would not convert to a Larry, chopped her head off to be sure. 

Add 4 more spells. Consider: acid arrows, shield (M), dimension door (M), identify, gust of wind, slow, fabricate, wall of fire, ice storm (M 150 studs)

Found boy from earlier, alive but unresponsive. Back at village ginnet offers to tell our story in song form: the witch in the bog, the bitch with the fog. :D 

Locket is of the two witch sisters in the bog.

Asked to see some books, found reference to a Special place to go meditate, notes saying can't go anymore cuz of the fog. 

Town protected by blue and/or green crystals, they will use them elsewhere now that we dispelled the fog. Except in the main hall in case something happens. 

Went back to body of witch, not decaying. Sense evil spirits. Dispel magic does nothing. Cauldron still boling outside. Dispelled magic and put fire out. Ginnet snuck head back with us. I yelled at him and the head is under a tree in a box overnight until we can talk to it tomorrow. 

Ginnet sneaks into Evian's room, theres a closet locked that he can't get into.  Quincy collected some potion. 

Previous elder Equest was odd, ppl were disappearing... the town elder would take ppl with him to meditate. Equest disappeared into the bog.... someone went missing and he went to find them with someone else and neither came back... shortly after the bad fog came... 

Ginnet tricks me Slip some of the unknown potion into ginnets drink next time. 

Lots of spirits in hallway where witch was, talking to them. Equest took their soul. he's not around anymore. They need to be returned to their bodies to be set free. Equest knows, and they point to a pacing ghost. He refuses to answer and vanishes. Last ghost says wait! as the potion wears off. Find tome in hidden part of Evian's office with her permission. Figure out that Dyonisus can help, create shrine to him and release all souls. They thank us. 

We left, went with the caravan in the back so we can't see the way, and got to the main city Cureul. Kept in the basement room until we are talked to. Walleecee is our host. 

Evan comes next morning, half elf, asking us why we're here. Quincy tells story of us looking for pirate. Pirate may have come through, not someone they would have normally let through, but she was with someone (pirate who's cave we ransacked), and was allowed. She went on a ship and is gone. Gives us small "marks of Cureul" to say we're allowed to be in the city. Plenty of followers of dyonisus. 

See some shady ppl with the cloaks we saw at Asquacua in the night by the pirate house, they were sneaking in the middle of the night. Ginnet sneaks off to trail them. Lucy and I run into Aresa, Lara, and Bern. Hand back the orange crystal. It turns out to be the Arcane Society, where we were supposed to return the orange crystal we borrowed. We're not allowed in, Lara and Bern cant help, didnt know it existed. 

We go to the meisters to ask for a meeting with Ilerar, 5000 gold, but we will investigate a disturbance in the south instead. Lucy hits on Avora- one of the meisters of the city, because she has a nice pant suit that her chamber maid made for her. 

Creara-ork at dyonisus temple, will help us at the south gate. Found webbing, looks like large spider, victims probably still alive. 

Went into dark cave after spider to rescue ppl. Spider could speak, said he ate crystals. Blue crystals were shielding her, green crystals were helping her heal. We killed her by breaking the crystals (by holding up opposite crystals to them) and then combating her. 

Past the spider's layer found a small distillery? Levers and an orb and a gold bowl. Red is for security, blue for portal, green is unlabeled. Pulled all yellow and orb glows, pulled all green and orb glows. With green levers pulled, and touching the orb, a dark other plane is visible with pathways. Red lever pulled and touching the orb summoned a wraith. ended up going to the other plane and go through dining rooms of a bulding in Curele. 

Overhear talk of Quay Silverborn, not captured but all guards killed, thought to be by Druteda island. on the sea somewhere. Sent message to Po who sent it on to Lar untat.

Investigating Holler's abandoned shop: found receipts for order from Ilear (pirate we're looking for) for some fancy clothes, 4 orders for $10000 for 3 vestments (robes) Arcanis Edous (arcane society?) 

Going to visit with the people that were taken by the spider. 

Clemet and George are two wolves. Their leader was Ilsta. Actual alpha male lives up north. We told them they're in danger and need to move. They said they don't want to but if we find a better place they may. Sheep are very readily available. Going to talk to druids up north to see if they'll take in the wolves into their territory.

Went back to town, got a satchel from the orc of a druid. The wolves went to talk to them because i had a great idea on how to sell the wolves on moving (rolled 3 saves on my special beer). Going back to town to get some rest. Maybe get to talk to some of the spider victims. 

Holer-owns clothing store in town, missing for a year, was in a box for a few months then sent to the spider. Was initially commissioned to make some robes for the Arcane Society. Robes were strange with an extra enchanted shadow to the symbol of A S. 3 orders, never picked up that he remembers. 

Sargent Obenier speaking with the spider victims, all seem to be simple civilians or farmers, Holer is the only one with a crazy kidnapping story. 

Broke into fake Arcane society building with Ash. Stole 3 books. Red tiefling, dragonborn sleeping next to her, two headed ogre, black tiefling... wreiths... 

Book - Abyssal gain the feet "the devil's feet" alignment may shift to evil, can walk with no sound, eyes glow red. 
Book - in sylvan -speaks of large mirror room and using crystals can reveal portals
Book - aquan - kill time - stop time in a small area. Author may be in Sumatu Sea in the north. 

If I concentrate enough, could learn the devil's feet spell.

Went to temple of Dionysus where there's a party going on, free beer, Ilear is celebrating. He's dancing with a woman, we understand is his escort. Services for her were in his ledger. Like 25 times. Lucy gets drunk and dances with pirates. No info. Quincy gets info that the red pirate was here a month ago, and headed south possibly to catch a ship.

Ilear's ship is called Sepultura, in draconian it means "grave". 

Sending to Poe, he can't scry. Tried sending to Lar Onstat (he's in charge of us) but the castle prevents my sending. 

Slept at night but in morning guards are looking for Quincy: looking for an old man with a beard with a glowing aura around him. Due to interference at arcane society. Shaved Quincy and gave him witch's hat to get orange hair. I alter myself to look like an older woman, Quincy's wife. Ginnet was a little kid. 

3 days in wilderness on shore. Found an abandoned mine. Retraced our steps and covered them. Found a cart, many small gems and 4 ferrets. Talking to two of them that I bribe with food. They tell of no people coming here, and no bigger gems or shiny objects. 

Ginnet making the cave homey with blankets and a fire at the entrance. Some bears over time but nothing happens. Poe comes and picks us up, two ferrets come with me. Decided to go to Tibit. Arrived in Tibit. Left book that gives nightmares back at the cave. 

Bern and Lara Linga not in Tibet, no access to library. Could join but involves 1000 gold and a magical signature. The signature allows for the society to scry on me, but no one could impersonate me. Go talk to Penea.

To join, my research would be the beans and worms and see if the beans affect animals and gives them power. Granted access to the library for this particular research, but over time I can gain access to the entire library etc. 

Trying to find lodging, can at the inn, or the brothel. Brothel has good alcohol and a cleric supplies them. Quincy heads over with everyone to check out the cleric.

Sitting next to a townie: researcher tried to kill people, then ran off and stole a boat.  

Trying to talk to Via next day. Enchantress, very good if she's interested. 

3 enchantments can usually go on an item. Via can do 4, maybe even up to 6 without making the item useless. 

Via sends us on a quest to get a holy relic in return for all the enchanting we want from her. 

Asking about a bag of holding, may find one, Animous Maevion shop says to come back in a few days, they'll reach out to people. 

Go off in the woods, find 4 panthers near a cave. Gave panthers food so they let us go in the cave. The cave was blessed by Athena and Lucian. Lucian is evil, wanting to enslave the world. Quincy removes Lucian's hold on the place and prays to Athena. She has us answer three questions, the answers are darkness, promise, and future which she says we will need, and opens the three doors in the cave. Found Aethena's blessing (rock on pedestal after cloud resolves into a rock), Dianisus' blessing (rock like Aethena) . Third room has a small cloud above the pedestal but dissipates as though someone already took what was here. Found some black and brown thread maybe from a robe. Saving it to scry if we can. 

Going on to next cave closest to Fino. Pull up to cliff side and fly up, caught by Leotera soldiers. Brought to nearby town, told them I'm with Arcane society, they believe me and send soldiers with us to the caves to make sure we're safe for research. 80 or so caves, maybe 4 caves worth looking at. Acid rains carved them. 

Panthers were Drigido panthers which are very deadly.

My cave, the questionable one, had a switch, ginnet pulled it and the bottom gave way. we all fell down. heard groans and noises... lots of necromantic and transmutation type magic. Chests were mimics, the skeleton turned into a mummy. Door - dwarven mine entrance, more chests with power crystals, actually mimics. Killed one. 

in cave for 6.5 hours. flew back up the way we fell in to get out. found a "light saber", two rings. lots of dead and undead things, and mimics. sitting with soldiers in their tent to be safe. 

check out other caves next day, found one with spiders we killed, another with a bottomless pit. Went down with Ginnet on broom, almost died, Ash had to fly down and get us. Never saw bottom. 

Antizio blade - identified by Poe on ship (the light saber looking thing). Red or green power crystal can power it, otherwise it saps energy from user with every strike if user fails saving throw. 

heading back to Via to give her one of the religious artifacts. 

Travelled back to Draconis, skipped over the dragons. Got paid, but not as much due to stressful times. Also we will be sent out on the ship to sea, and will be learning how to sail on our own. Lucy is captain, Ginnet is navigator.

Learned scry. to learn transportation circle I need another 25 inkwells. Don't have the money, but got recipe for it and shared it with Ginnet and Lucy. They can maybe make me batches of this so I don't have to pay. Looking at the teleportation circle at the barracs in Dranas. 

Saw cat we saw at town that was levelled. Didn't want to talk but dropped a belt. 
Assassination on librarians, assassin struck, wore all black and had a big crossbow as big as her on her back. No one was killed as this was somewhat expected. Lots of fog so can't see well. Don't know why librarians are targeted. The 

Dragons: young are low in health, vicious claws and teeth. 10-15 d6 damage from breath and also have sleep breath. Could scare away. Large dragons have more health so much more dangerous. Can respect each other but not form friendships. No documented ancient dragons on Celenderia continent where the book is at. 

Caught up with cat... Wants a book with gold and silver binding (same as the other elf that wants the book for the ring). In exchange he'll give us the staff. Cat (wood elf) is Incantiolo, worship or praise cats in some form. Made the staff. Book in ancient. Beware other beasts in Whand, it's not just the dragons that are dangerous. 

Hired an elf and a dwarf to help with navigating the ship. Cramini Fijar and Drawmax Dindle. 

Out to sea, scrying daily on red pirate. See a small warehouse, she is shifting through boxes, light where we are, but dark where she is, the sun is down. Alone and digging through boxes. 

Hired 4 more people for a total crew of 6. 50 gold a month for 4, 245 for another, and sea captain is taking items. Total 445 plus items for captain. (89 gold each of us per month). 

Where the mail flows the pirate is to and fro
Obhele is where most of the shipping headquarters is, probably where Dyionisus is saying the red pirate is. 

Quan (city)-ancient ruins, surrounded by murderous vines/grass. In a house found a private library. Copying several titles, all in ancient so cant understand. 


1284... now 300 something? 

Followed roots down underground, vines can pop up and disappear. If flowers around, magic is absorbed. One flower can absorb one magic spell per round. If plucked, may pierce and throw acid from thorns. Need silvered weapons to affect the skin of the plant. 

Scried on red pirate: on boat, setting course for Galdour. Silver and gold power crystal. They look very powerful. 

Galdour had some army that was leaving, we went after some smoke in the distance, turns out it's the pirates. Got on an evil road and met someone guarding the way to the pirates. Very strong, couldn't get past (not even attempt). Went to old castle instead where the experiments were and evil wizards. Were almost killed by invisible floating jaws. Found and took Statia with us who had been unconscious for a month, injured. She joined our crew.  Decided to leave (informed the military of the pirates).

Going to Colligus to get the ork we met as a guide to go to Nautrengo. 

Seeing meisters of the city: the mark we all got is specific to the person who gave it, not to the person specifically. Ships are not allowed in or out unless made by the city and manned by the city. Given optional mission to the south of the continent to kill some spiders and retrieve artifacts for 5K gold. Offer to train us for 1K gold for gaining a level in other areas (wizard, bard, fighter, cleric, ranger, barbarian).

Incent Mtallo- fortune teller who had the cursed deck of taro cards.. killed him and anyone else who it was read for. The Vindica tracked it down and locked it away. 

Spells im interested in: conjuring ones like conjure elemental, and conjure lesser demon, etc.

import.backstory:
A Leonian from the city of Prixus, a moderate upbringing only lightly touched by the recent war between Leoterra and Nautregno.

His gentlemanly ways only slightly a stark contrast against his adventuring ways. Always well dressed with an almost signature shit-eating grin to get what he wants.

However, deep down under the fancy clothes, is a cutthroat bastard who's gotten as far as they have by stabbing people in the back.

Labors under the delusion that they are the protagonist in their own adventure story.
import.name: Lan Pintiru
import.note:
Ended up on Vatnunda with 3 others, however on trying to get into a tunnel, drew the attention of some kind of large wyrm.

In the chaos of the fray, abandoned the others when the fight quickly went south with their strongest being eaten by the wyrm.

Searching for a way off of the island, saw the boat in the distance and sneakily followed the party to "casually" run into them.

import.backstory:
Growing up an orphan and rescued by a temple of human clerics, Torinn followed Daminoth for years before losing faith, culminating in the burning down of the temple with the head priest and mentor of Torinn still inside.  After several years of wandering around the continent, Torinn saw what he described as a miracle and is trying to re-find his faith.  While starting to believe again, finding a purpose still alludes him.  All of this has left him sullen and grumpy, and has made it hard to get close to others.

Torinn's most prized possession is the symbol of Daminoth that was a relic of the temple found after the fire, which is a trident that had been passed down to the head of the temple.

import.backstory:
Ideal:
Norwind is sailor from Turrija who found work on mercantile vessels from Coneixager.  He is constantly searching for ancient wisdom and pre-event artifacts.

Reality:
Norwind is a thief and con artist.  After ripping off the wrong mark, he needed to lay low for a while, and took a lucrative assignment from the thieve's guild collecting valuable items and knowledge from far away lands.  Norwind usually has a contingency plan if things go wrong, and he values his freedom above all else.

Like Blaja because Blaja thinks Crov is smarter even though Blaja never trusts that when their gambling. Crov isn't that smart and doesn't think himself smarter than Blaja band happily respects his brother in arms except in games.

*Starts 3rd level:
Advantage on attack rolls against creature that has't taken a turn in combat yet. Any hit scored against creature that is surprised is a critical hit.

Bonus proficiency with disguise kit and poisoners kit

*Starts 9th Level: Infiltration
Unfailingly create false identities for self (not an identity that belongs to someone else).

*13th Level: Imposter 

Skull Word: Ignus

Evasion level 7
Beginning at 7th level, you can nimbly dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as an ancient red dragons fiery breath or an ice storm spell. When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

Breath Weapon
When you use your breath weapon, target must make a saving throw: DC for this saving throw equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 2d6 damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 3d6 at 6th level, 4d6 at 11th level, and 5d6 at 16th level.
After you use your breath weapon, you cant use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

import.description: A very bulky and tough plant, its magical diet has enabled it to move slightly. Covered with small flowers, it can be Hedged, each flower having an ${10+con,orange}$AC and ${3*con,orange}$HP. These plants fed off of power crystal veins deep underground of those carried by other creatures, drawing the plants to them. Additionally, they slowly consume the corpses of other creatures in their area. They use the natural acid created in their veins to create an extremely tough and rigid skin, making them invulnerable to Piercing and Slashing damage, and highly resistant to some magics. As the root of a Referri Vines, the death of the plant also kills any vines in the area.
import.name: Referri Plant

import.description: These vines are weak for the power that they have, their whipping motion capable of excruciating pain, as well as constricting a large living creature. They use the natural acid created in their veins to create an extremely tough and rigid skin, making them invulnerable to Piercing and Slashing damage, and highly resistant to some magics. Adding to their threatening lore, they tend to occur in groups, making quick work of anything that arrives nearby. The best way of dealing with them is to notice the them before you are in their grasp, as if they catch you it may be too late.
import.name: Referri Vine

Creatures caught in the explosion perform a
import.name: Flaming Skull Spirit

import.description: A floating skull oozing with liquid, typically of an angry spirit trying to manifest itself into the world. Typically charges in a screaming manner at any living creature, exploding on impact for 4d12 Acid damage and 4d12 Necrotic damage in an ${8,orange}$ stud radius. Creatures caught in the explosion perform a Constitution save at DC${19,orange}$ and on failure are cursed, suffering ${-1,orange}$ to all stats until the curse is removed or the afflicted creature dies. If the creatures caught in the explosion fail their saving throw and take ${52,orange}$ damage or less after reductions, they receive the Oozing Curse. If they take more than ${52,orange}$ damage, they receive the Horrific Oozing Curse resulting in an additional 2 points off from every stat.

They use the natural acid created in their veins to create an extremely tough and rigid skin, making them invulnerable to Piercing and Slashing damage, and highly resistant to some magics. Adding to their threatening lore, they tend to occur in groups, making quick work of anything that arrives nearby. The best way of dealing with them is to notice the them before you are in their grasp, as if they catch you it may be too late.
import.name: Referri Vine Gen17

import.description:
Bound to protect a burial ground, a Golem will aggressively seek and kill anything within the space it has been enchanted to protect.

As with most ancient devices and constructs, these creatures are enhanced by the arcane energies of power crystals, however even without the pressence of power crystals, the Golem is still a challenging foe for even the most equipped of intruders.
import.name: Funeral Pyre Golem
import.note: Depending on the color alignment this creature receives bonuses: + **Blue**: Receives 1 Legendary Resistance per round while active, up to 3. + **Green**: Heals 1d12 damage per round. + **Red**: Deals an additional 1d12 or damage. + **Yellow** (In Addition): Can reflect 50% of incoming damage out as an arc of orange lightning, either into a creature within 30 studs or into the ground. + **Cyan** (In Addition): Can use a legendary resistance to cancel any healing effect within 30 studs. + **Purple** (In Addition): Can redirect or counter any spells within 30 studs. + **White** (In Addition): Invulnerable to all damage. Even if disconnected, this effect persists for 3 rounds.

import.name: Svyi Gravebook
import.note:
# Equipment
+ 17G + 75S
+ Leather Armor
+ Quarterstaff (1d6 / 1d8 Bludgeoning)
+ Crystal Arcane Focus
+ 1 x Potion of Healing: 40G - 2d4 + 2
+ Component Pouch
+ 2 x Red Mushroom (Poisonous)
+ Scroll of Mage Armor
+ Dungeoneer's Backpack
    + 50' Hempen Rope
    + 10 Torches
    + Crowbar
    + Hammer
    + 10 pitons
    + Tinderbox
    + 10 Days Rations

# Feats
+ Great Old One

# Eldritch Invocations
+ Eldritch Sight (Detect Magic at Will)
+ Eyes of the Runekeeper (Can read all languages)

# Spells

## Cantrips
+ Prestidigitation
+ Eldritch Blast

## Spells 1
+ Dissonant Whispers (Great Old One)
+ Tasha's Hideous Laughter (Great Old One)
+ Comprehend Languages (Was Unseen Servent)
+ Armor of Agathys
+ Arms of Hadar

# People (Neverwinter)
Greesefist (Gnoll)- Barkeep  
Pelosil (Human) - Head of the guard

# Notes (Session 1)
+ Oakhurst - Standard Town - Known for midsummer festival
     + In a few weeks
     + Magical Fruit - Cure anything
     + Merchant goblins near town sell the fruit
     + (Costs 50G)

Party of 4 to investigate the origin of the fruit, haven't been heard from. Duo in the party are brother and sister of the general store keeper. Family ring from brother and sister count as a find, half reward for the rings (250 instead of 500). Mayor is adding 200G from original reward for information.  Other 2 of the group are inconsequential.

Local human ranger, brother and sister are perkel family, tolbrin (brother:punchy) and charwin (sister:booky). Sir Bradford paladin from out of town, believed to have been hired by the other 3 for the adventure,

The goblins simply show up around the time of the festival, they are _NOT_ contacted by the town. Festival has been going for 10 to 15 years.

Town with the Tavern has some strange things happening in the night.

# Head East from Tavern to Town

6 Hour trek

Spot a knawed on rabbit with small teeth marks. Turned out to be cactus barbs. Apparently the cacti in the area may retalliate.

Oakenhurst is a bit barren but historically destroyed by  a dragon. Some farming shouold still be happening but the area seems a bit more barren than expected.


## Reach Oakenhurst

Main street seems to have most things. General Store, Colonel's Habidasery. 

Store: 
+ Potion of Climbing: 60G
+ 2 x Potion of Healing: 40G

Pass on condolences to general store owner.  Store keep - Kari Wyrn. 18 Persuasion get potions. Give climbing to Bumkin and Healing to Rick, keep the last Healing Potion.

Ran into the town guard, she was responsible for the dead things on the road. She warns against nighttime travel.

## Old Boar Inn

Tavern keep is Garen. 

No information on the ruins. 

Old Bellock, towns folk who was curious about the ruins awhile back.

Room with Bumkin in the tavern

Gabi watches over night, learns Bellock was 13 years ago.

Something in Garen's pie? Gives temporary hit points for the day.

## Head East to the ruins

Find some pillars and find a rope attached to it dropping down into a ravine.

Rope is well tied to the pillar but is loosely handing. ~80' to the bottom.

Hear some sounds in the distance at the ravine

Camp site rubble in the area in the ravine seems unused for several years. Several spearheads in the rubble. No sign of the lost party.

Courtyard at the bottom of the stairs, lots of destroyed masonry, seemingly pieces of a destroyed castle. See a door across the courtyard.

Bumpkin runs over and falls into a trap. Fight some large rats in the area. Scimitar near goblin like corpse. Trapdoor nearby resets.

Trap door in front of door to the ruins

## Ruins

Body at bottom of trap door, scimitar, shield, 23 silver pieces. Confirm goblins. One has only been dead for a day. Other one possibly years.

Language on shield similar to dwarvish, possibly goblin.

Get through the door and see 4 dead goblins, not fresh though. 3 on the ground, 1 speared to the far wall as we enter.

Find a room with the far wall collapsed and a stone door in particularly good shape and quality build. Far corner has a sleeping giant rat. Dragon's Mouth as a key hole on the door.

Find a small kolbold in the ruins. House of Houseotricks. Meepo. Ruler of castle tricks. Red and Black scales. udrasil. another kolbolt in the area.

Kobolt's worship dragons. Hate goblins.

Meepo gives a call out at the doors, announcing us so that the kolbolts don't attack us.

A couple of kolbolts take a female goblin prisoner back the way we came from.

Meepo introduces us to other kolbolts and says we help with Calcitrux, their missing dragon.

Kolbolts had help from the 4 we're searching for and they have not heard from them either.

Calcitrix is a young dragonborn. Main entrance into goblin territory. Only been missing a few days.

Potential rewards; 2 Scrolls, Key chain, Flask

Kolbolts have a few goblin prisoners but none that they suspect are of note.

Prestidigitation clean a cloth and use it to wrap some poisonous mushrooms.

Goblin prisoner's name is Grenold. She's more important than she's letting on but has no friends. The durback tribe. Seems similar to the unknown markings on the shield. She wants her tribe back. She knows of 2 men and a woman. Doesn't know of a fourth. They were prisoners of Durn. The leader of the goblins.

Ask guard about magical goblins and he hasn't heard of any. Thikning back they exist but they are very rare.

A couple fountains in the room where meepo let's us in.

Find a disarmed trap in the corridor. Find human tracks heading past the trap. More tracks going deeper than coming back. A few rat tracks that seem bigger than the rats we've seen. 

In the area at the end, slightly interesting smell. Meepo points left and says "Gobos" and the other door "Not sure".

Bumpkin runs up to the unsure door and opens it. Odor runs forth and confirms the smell is dead stuff. Also finds a giant engorged rat.

Dissonant whispers (3d6:16) kills the giant rat, it blows up and drops a bunch of small tiny rats that deal piercing damage AoE around her and they disperse.

Healing potion for Bimkin from rat explosion: (4+2+2:8) to bring him conscious. Keep watch while the rest dig through the room collecting coin and loot. 68G, 300S, and 3 Blue Gems @25G each. 2 goblins, 1 kobolt, 1 human. Human male, has a ring but indicates that it is the ranger. Backpack has some rations, torches, potion of healing, another 17G. Studded leather armor. 5 daggers. Bow.
+ 1 Potion > Me
+ 1 Ring > Bimkin
+ 1 Studded Leather Armor > Streya
+ 5 Daggers > Bimkin
+ 3 Gems > Me
+ 1 Bow > Streya

Goblin door has a bell attached to the door as a crude alarm. Caltrips line the hall after Streya disarmed the bell.

Slide into hallway, shit stealth rolls, human and halfling get a small light and get shot at, we retreat. Failed a thaumaturgy intimidation. Take a short rest, the goblins locked the door while we rested.

# Session 2

Pick the lock, seems pretty easy. 

kill goblins rescue 3 kobolds and a gnome

Acolyte of moridin, god of lore and knowledge. Erkie Timbers. 

Give 2 blue gems to Rick.

Find Calcitrix, she's broken free but stayed in the area, goblins have tried to recapture her but she's pretty comfy with her small hoard of jade and silverware.

Bring her hoard -  
Scroll case that interests bimkin in the hoard

Nothing magical in her hoard.

Get calcitrix back and get presented with rewards:  
+ Small Flask with Orange Liquid (Elixir of health; 3 charges, 1 charge cures any condition)
+ 4 Spell Scrolls (2 citrus colored gems)
     1. Mage Armor > Me
     2. Spider Climb
     3. Knock
     4. Mike's Hard Lemonade > 4 10G Gems - Scroll + Gem makes an alcohol that treats minor poison or disease
+ Key in the shape of a dragon

Buy the goblin from the kobolt

Gremmel overthrown 6 months ago, she handles selling the fruit.

Bellocke is the human in the depths of the ruin responsible for the fruit.

Goblins may be also to be calmed, hobgoblins will be violent and have a Bugbear named Ballsack.

Open dragon lock, large marble marble statue in the middle of the room. Ancient room.

Statue is magical, illusion magic. Behind the statue is a door with adjuration magic.

Riddle from Statue: We come at night without being fetched; 
We disappear by day without being stolen; What are we?

Not shadow; Darkness maybe? Stars. Said stars outloud and door lights up.

Smaller room, door on opposidte side of room. Table in the middle. Candle burning in he middle. Something written on the door but have to go in to see.

Candle is magical. Evocation magic. Candle is brighter than expected and no heat. Seems like continual flame is cast on the candle. Wax is not melting.

A dragon priest entombed a lie for transgressions of the Law, still retains the honor of his position.

Open the door violet tiles covering floor and walls, all cracked. Large stone coming through the back wall, no other doors. Small candle area, 2 torches burning with a greenish flame. Greenish sarcophagus, 9ft long and has dragon imagery. Iron clasps lock the lid and the head has a dragon design.

Torches have evocation magic. Sarcophagus has magic but the construction makes it difficult to tell.

Clasps aren't locked, just difficult to open. Unseen Servant can't open them. Others get them.

Looks like a withered and rotted troll. Sequester spell released from the sarcophagus. Spell scrolls underneath him.

Troll rises and asks for a dragon to sacrifice for immortality, asking if we want to join him. We take to long and end up in combat.

Stays dead thanks to fire damage.

Servant brings me a spell scroll of **Command**. Dagger isn't magical. 2 Silver  rings on his hand, a silver amulet, and coins in with amulet. 50G in tomb. None are magical just decorative.

4 Scrolls:
+ Cure Wounds (L2)
+ Inflict Wounds (L2)
+ Guiding Bolt (L2)
+ Command (L2)

Also have a "Candle of Continual Flame" that can't burn anything.

Resting in the tomb, get a vision of like dying trees. PAtron focsues my vision and see a massive tree in the middle, with a red cyst in the middle of the tree. Hear the word "Power" as I focus in. Seeming to describe the cyst.

Notably, the troll spoke elvish and lots of elvish script in the tomb.

Has the "standard" mark of a refuge and is noted as being a political asylum seeker from Leoterra, seemingly having offended a local governor with a bad joke and escaped prosecution by fleeing to Colligus.

Finding no way to make ends meet, he took to crime and has simply been robbing people as needed with his friends and living just outside the outskirts of town for safety.

"Red Tiefling"
import.note:
Real Name: Resana Ursic

Head of the Arcanous Edious house in Curell. Serves Crane as a researcher of Ancient.

Part demon from a Curse inflicted on herself.

Knows of the Ranger Galvin and watched the group mingle with him.

Also knows of Irena and her service to Crane, but nothing specific.

Has paid off a skilled group of bandits to capture Galvin and bring him to her as of Alucevum 6, 319

import.name: "Black Tiefling"
import.note:
Real Name: Demba Crasaren

Works with the Arcanous Edious house in Curell and acts as a guard. Responsible for hunting people down at times but mostly sticks to the house.

Part demon from a Curse inflicted on him by Resana.

Not kept informed of much beyond the scope of the house in Curell and he's okay with that. His loyalty is to Resana who he grew up with.

import.name: "Blue Dragonborn"
import.note:
Real Name: Nephio Dieser

Works with the Arcanous Edious house in Curell and is extremely intelligent, helping Resana make progress on her translations and working out spells.

He doesn't know much about Crane or the Arcane Syndicate and doesn't care to. The funding for his research drives him and he is okay with killing any number of creatures to attain more knowledge.

Is on the path to becoming a Lich but Resana only funds his ancient research, not his lich research.

He has a phylactery hidden away in Northern lunderipio.

import.description: Lithe for a Dragonborn, he is quick and scary dangerous judging from the look in his eyes.
import.name: "FIIIIIIIIIIIYREEEEEEE"
import.note:
Real Name: Coshil Elitijar

Works with the Arcanous Edious house in Curell and is frankly crazy. Usually considered the reason people leave the house alone least Resana sic Coshil on them.

Is essentially Resana's fuck toy and is fairly loyal to her for this and that she appreciates and respects his crazyness. This with his love for killing and torturing others makes him very dangerous.

He is also quite skilled at talking people out of things when he wants to but he's normally out enjoying being a madman.

Given divine resistance by Resana as an extremely powerful blessing, however this is essentially from durong and manifests as a mark of durong upon him.
